summary: CONSUMER STARTED VEHICLE AND RETRIEVED SOME ITEMS FROM THE  INTERIOR CABIN.  CONSUMER SAW A FLASH AND THEN SMELLED A "BURNING" ODOR.  LIGHTING HAD STRUCK THE STEEL ANTENNA.  THE SAME INCIDENT OCCURRED WITH THE CONSUMER'S 1997 DODGE CARAVAN.  CONSUMER BELIEVED THE ANTENNA WAS DEFECTIVE.          *JB
